captions.text: I don't care I don’t mind whatever you say

I’m good enough Although I’m not 28
but don’t worry I’m still spry
Oh yeah I’m a slave for being snobby
Saying goodbye to the gloomy days
I know yes this song is actually
a bloody song for idols Uh!
Fuck yeah Never mind beep sound

Senior title is nasty work
like a rooky for good
I'm fly to death. 911

Man u da best
This is an irony
Hm I’m not thoughtless
Just don’t think the after math
It’s simple close your eyes

I don’t care how I look like
to live without regrets
I know myself better than you
Don’t ask me if it’s okay
You know that I want more
Go first you first
I get as much as I want
However you think about me
I will just leave to do what I do

Step back It would be good to be
out of the way avoid avoid me
Leave quickly Keep the light on
It would be good to empty the stage now
Leave promptly for me
Please get out of here timid idiots
Even when being fancy is dangerous
If it is cool, I will be

Have no time I don’t talk down to you
I have to go Back off right now beat it

In my own way

In my own way

The soaring hero ho

Gets free here

just a cushion under my head ho

You know nothing

Keep watching me silently

comments.text:
I don't see why or how letting 12 members debut together would've hurt the 
company. If it's about money, maybe Starship shouldn't have started 
NO.MERCY in the first place because honestly their lack of motivation to 
deal with all 12 trainees just ended with giving these guys false hope, and 
only fulfilling the dream of a few while leaving the rest in the dust. ﻿

comments.author: ellenlovesit

comments.text:
Both Hieut and 0 Young are amazing songs. Really. I think that there is 
always going to be that side of things just due to how No.mercy ended and 
how the lineup for Monsta X is gonna be. 
Truthfully, from a point of view were I'm looking at the music, the video 
is a lot better. You have designated spots for all of the trainees and 
Jungigo and Nochang had their parts in the beginning and end. I have to say 
that with 0 Young, it was completely taken over by the idols and then I.M. 
and Jooheon, cause the rappers. The beat was ok, but Vasco was amazing and 
pulled everyone's talents together here. This song is a lot more catchy and 
interesting, because it's showing the talents, not slipping them in every 
so often. And this is coming from someone who deeply enjoys both songs.
Can't we leave the fact that No.mercy/Monsta X happened/is happening and 
just look at the pure talent we see in this video from the trainees?﻿
